attributes.action: Require transmission companies to justify why pylons should be built above ground
attributes.additional_details: Electricity pylons are defacing Great Britain's beautiful countryside, and perhaps harming the health of those who live near them.  The whole-life cost of burying transmission cables may not be much different from building above-ground.  Transmission companies should be required by the regulator to justify why they should transmit electricity above ground.  The default should be to bury transmission lines.
